brand.name: Lex AI Club
brand.description: Access Tier-1 Engineers, Founders, and Investors

communityBenefits.title: Peer-to-Peer Support
communityBenefits.description: Post what you're building. Get solutions, guidance, and technical support from experienced practitioners who've solved the same problems.

communityBenefits.title: Tier-1 Mentorship
communityBenefits.description: Direct access to engineers and scientists from Google, Microsoft, and Amazon who review your work and guide your career.

communityBenefits.title: High-Value Networking
communityBenefits.description: Connect with AI-focused recruiters, active investors, successful founders, and engineers from FAANG and unicorns.

communityBenefits.title: Exclusive Opportunities
communityBenefits.description: Hear about AI roles, collaborations, and partnerships before they hit the open market. Your next opportunity is one conversation away.

communityBenefits.title: Weekly Events
communityBenefits.description: Investor roundtables, AMA sessions, founder forums, and live expert deep-dives. Every week brings new connections.

communityBenefits.title: AI Learning Track
communityBenefits.description: Self-paced fellowship curriculum included. Videos, notes, and live sessions to accelerate your technical skills.

communityLeaders.name: Amit Verma
communityLeaders.bio: Amit is an applied scientist at Google, specializing in large-scale AI systems and ML for production. He mentors members on cutting-edge research and practical deployment.

communityLeaders.name: Priya Shah
communityLeaders.bio: Priya leads AI-driven product teams at Microsoft, driving business impact with ML. She is passionate about inclusive leadership and cross-functional collaboration.

communityLeaders.name: Rahul Singh
communityLeaders.bio: Rahul builds and optimizes ML pipelines for global Amazon teams. His mentoring focuses on scalable ML engineering and open source contributions.

communityLeaders.name: Sneha Patel
communityLeaders.bio: Sneha is a founder building healthcare AI solutions. She advises early-stage startups on fundraising, product strategy, and community growth.

testimonials.name: Amit Verma
testimonials.content: Joining Lex AI Club helped me discover new opportunities in applied AI. The mentorship from industry leaders is something you won’t find anywhere else.
testimonials.outcome: Landed a senior ML role at a unicorn

testimonials.name: Priya Shah
testimonials.content: The peer group here is second to none. I found both co-founders and technical collaborators through the Club’s events.
testimonials.outcome: Started an AI-commerce startup with peers

testimonials.name: Rahul Singh
testimonials.content: I got direct feedback from mentors at FAANG companies, which really accelerated my project. I now contribute to open source on a global stage.

testimonials.name: Sneha Patel
testimonials.content: Thanks to the Lex community, I found investors and advisors for my healthcare AI venture. The support is genuine and ongoing.

testimonials.name: Karan Desai
testimonials.content: The regular roundtables and AMAs helped me learn from the best in the business. My technical confidence skyrocketed.
testimonials.outcome: Promoted to lead Data Science team

testimonials.name: Ananya Iyer
testimonials.content: The guidance and code reviews from senior mentors steered my research in the right direction and expanded my professional network.
testimonials.outcome: Received offer from top global lab

events.title: Investor Roundtable
events.description: Weekly sessions where 5 startups pitch to active AI investors

events.title: Ask Me Anything
events.description: Direct Q&A with industry leaders from top AI companies

events.title: Founder Forums
events.description: Peer support sessions for AI founders to share challenges and wins

events.title: Expert Deep-Dives
events.description: Technical sessions on LLMs, agents, and production ML systems

hero.headline: India's Most Exclusive AI Network
hero.subheadline: Access Tier-1 engineers, founders, and investors from Google, Amazon, and Microsoft. Your network becomes your strongest career asset.

community.headline: Access People, Not Just Content
community.subheadline: The Lex AI Club gives you something no course can — direct connections to the people shaping AI's future.

network.headline: Your Inner Circle
network.subheadline: Connect with Tier-1 AI professionals who actively mentor, collaborate, and open doors.

testimonials.headline: Careers Transformed. Connections Made.
testimonials.subheadline: Our members don't just learn — they land roles, find co-founders, and build their network.

events.headline: Every Week, New Opportunities
events.subheadline: Investor roundtables, AMAs, founder forums, and expert sessions. The community never stops moving.

cta.headline: Your Network is Your Net Worth
cta.subheadline: The most valuable capital isn't money — it's access to the right people.
cta.description: Join a high-trust circle of ambitious minds. Unlimited value through people.

footer.tagline: Built for the future of AI
